byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: German war materials output lauded by R Hess
snippet: BERLIN, May 1--The May Day holiday passed quietly throughout the Reich today. Official quarters had decreed that there would be no flags displayed and no public demonstrations and as a result, in contrast to previous years, display was lacking fro...

headline.main: MAY DAY OBSERVANCE IN REICH IS CURTAILED; Hess Makes Speech; Buerckel Gives Out Theatre Tickets

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, May 1--The May Day holiday passed quietly throughout the Reich today. Official quarters had decreed that there would be no flags displayed and no public demonstrations and as a result, in contrast to previous years, display was lacking from today's picture.
